pkgmetadata.longdescription: Image Scan! is a graphical scanner utility for people that do not need all the bells and whistles provided by several of the other utilities out there (xsane, QuiteInsane, Kooka). At the moment it only supports SEIKO EPSON scanners and all-in-ones. However, the scanner driver it provides can be used by any other SANE standard compliant scanner utility.
